alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 11:14PM CST until January 27 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Arkansas, including the following county, Saline. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1113 PM CST, Emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Benton... Haskell... Traskwood... Shaw... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
